name: Gladiator (itch) (Khar03)
description:
In this game you become a gladiator and you will fight against other gladiators. As your strength will grow, your opponents will usually be more experienced fighters. If even that won´t stop you, then you will face against the champion of the arena. Who will survive?

Controls: WASD - moving, Space - attacking

Tip: In shop you can select skills by clicking on frames with I, II, III and IV indexes, selecting learned skill, which you want to assign and confirming selection.
